Docs.summary: Specifies the type of user Rights Account Certificate to request for rights management activation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Used as a parameter to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method of a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>, UserActivationMode specifies to request either a `Temporary` or `Permanent` [Rights Account Certificate](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74474).
